message.content:
Here is a sample healthy meal plan for the week without dairy, garlic, almonds, pistachios, and cashews:

Monday:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with banana, blueberries, and walnuts topped with cinnamon and flax seeds
Lunch: Quinoa salad with grilled chicken, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, bell peppers, and a lemon-olive oil dressing
Dinner: Baked salmon with roasted sweet potatoes and asparagus
Snack: Apple slices with almond butter (substitute sunflower seed butter)

Tuesday:
Breakfast: Avocado toast on whole grain bread with tomato, spinach, and feta-less feta cheese
Lunch: Lentil soup with carrots, celery, and whole wheat crackers
Dinner: Stir-fried tofu with broccoli and brown rice
Snack: Carrot sticks with hummus

Wednesday:
Breakfast: Smoothie made of mixed berries, banana, spinach, and coconut milk (substitute almond milk for soy milk)
Lunch: Quinoa salad with chickpeas, corn, and red onion
Dinner: Grilled chicken with zucchini noodles and roasted squash
Snack: Sliced pear with sunflower seeds

Thursday:
Breakfast: Egg white omelette with mushrooms and turkey bacon
Lunch: Lentil salad with kale, cucumber, and olive oil dressing
Dinner: Roasted chicken with green beans and sweet potato wedges
Snack: Sliced peaches with pumpkin seeds

Friday:
Breakfast: Oatmeal pancakes with maple syrup substitute (agave nectar)
Lunch: Black bean burger on a whole wheat bun, lettuce wraps, and tomato slices
Dinner: Turkey meatballs with spaghetti squash and roasted cauliflower
Snack: Edamame with sea salt

Saturday:
Breakfast: Fruit salad with chia seeds
Lunch: Lentil soup with carrots, and whole grain bread
Dinner: Baked fish with brussel sprouts
Snack: Banana chips

Sunday:
Breakfast: Scrambled tofu with bell peppers and onions
Lunch: Quinoa salad with chickpeas, olives, and sunflower seeds
Dinner: Tofu stir-fry with broccoli and cauliflower rice
Snack: Cucumber slices with tahini dip

Monday:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with raisins and coconut flakes
Lunch: Lentil salad with artichoke, and whole grain crackers
Dinner: Grilled shrimp with roasted beets
Snack: Dried apricots

Tuesday:
Breakfast: Smoothie made of mixed berries, banana, coconut milk (substitute almond milk)
Lunch: Lentil soup with kale and brown rice
Dinner: Turkey burger on lettuce wraps, tomato slices
Snack: Apple slices with pumpkin seeds

Wednesday:
Breakfast: Egg white omelette with mushrooms and turkey bacon
Lunch: Chickpea salad with cucumber, and olive oil dressing
Dinner: Quinoa stir-fry with green beans
Snack: Dried figs

Thursday:
Breakfast: Fruit salad with chia seeds
Lunch: Black bean burger on whole grain bread
Dinner: Tofu with roasted carrots and cauliflower rice
Snack: Pineapple slices with sunflower seeds

This meal plan is just an example, you can adjust the ingredients to your preference. Make sure to have a good balance of protein, healthy fats, carbohydrates, and fiber in each meal for a well-rounded diet. Also, don't forget to drink plenty of water throughout the day.
